1100001011100001 0100001100100100 0 -> sum: 0000011000000101, cout: 1
1010001110110101 0010011100110011 1 -> sum: 1100101011101001, cout: 0
0001111000001010 0111111111110000 1 -> sum: 1001110111111011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
